Db2Excel.name: 全省CELL参数普查
Db2Excel.sql: select p.vendorparameter,d.pvalue,count(*) num from vendorparametermap p ,necelldatamap d where p.vpkey=d.vpkey group by p.vendorparameter,d.pvalue order by p.vendorparameter

Db2Excel.name: 常德CELL参数普查
Db2Excel.sql: select p.vendorparameter,d.pvalue,count(*) num from vendorparametermap p ,necelldatamap d where p.vpkey=d.vpkey and d.cnkey in (select cnkey from necellmap where nodename like 'CD%') group by p.vendorparameter,d.pvalue order by p.vendorparameter
